member.name: IMFMediaEngineClassFactoryEx.CreateMediaKeys
member.summary: Creates a media keys object based on the specified key system.
member.param: Points to a location to store Content Decryption Module (CDM) data which might be locked by multiple process and so might be incompatible with store app suspension.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineClassFactoryEx.CreateMediaSourceExtension
member.param: This parameter is reserved and must be set to 0.

param.name: pAttr
param.para: This method supports the following Media Foundation attributes:

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineClassFactoryEx.IsTypeSupported
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates if the specified key system supports the specified media type.
member.param: The MIME type to check support for.
The key system to check support for.
true if type is supported by keySystem; otherwise, false.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
